body_html: @apaszke the nccl team told me that we shouldn't have too many nccl communicators created (more than one from what they said), I am not sure what unknown problem we could hit when the number of cached communicators goes unbounded.
body_text: @apaszke the nccl team told me that we shouldn't have too many nccl communicators created (more than one from what they said), I am not sure what unknown problem we could hit when the number of cached communicators goes unbounded.
body: @apaszke the nccl team told me that we shouldn't have too many nccl communicators created (more than one from what they said), I am not sure what unknown problem we could hit when the number of cached communicators goes unbounded.
